subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A few from today.
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
--0-1037006218-1193776432=:32729
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Hiya Frank
   
  I can hear those, tho I hear a few added words in there like "thier reality is we can talk-tell them" 
   
  But overall I hear them as you do. 
   
  I think sometimes static helps, many of the voices I have gotten are made up from the static itself. It is distracting for some peoples hearing but I have grown accustomed to it so it can be seen as an enhancement at times. When I first started there was so much static it was overwhelming to hear thru it, but now I just hear it as a multilayer and sometimes that layer holds its own messages.
   
  Misty

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
           Trying to make a compact sound chamber, or box, or whatdoyacallit. Ive been working on this box for two weeks--so far. The sound is noisy, but that's just the nature of AM. If you want adaquate gain to pick up enough signals, then you get the static as well. 
 
 
 Frank-S
